content: As an AI language model, I cannot accurately determine your pet's preference. But in general, some pets may feel anxious in a carrier, especially if they are not used to being in enclosed spaces. It's important to make sure that the carrier is comfortable and familiar to your pet, and to start with short trips to help them get used to the experience. You can also try putting a favorite blanket or toy in the carrier to help your pet feel more comfortable. If your pet continues to show signs of anxiety or discomfort, it may be best to avoid taking them on the subway.
